10 Things that I wish I had known in High School

18 August 2014

**1. Everything that mom says is right** **2. Popularity isn't worth it** **3. Summer isn't play time** **4. Try to be the smartest in every class** **5. Suck up to teachers** **6. Get more hobbies** **7. Don't take education for granted** **8. When it's time to work it's time work** **9. Don't be limited by your age**
